p.s: Have you been wanting new artwork for your walls ?
Do you ever get tired of staring at the same old posters and pictures of things that you do n't like anymore ?
If you are , then keep reading this article to find out how you can choose great artwork for your bedroom that you 'll want to keep around for a while .

list.item:
Choose artwork with cool colors .
Two examples of cool colors are blue and green .
Warm colors such as red , yellow and orange should be saved for rooms where you want a more inviting atmosphere , such as your living room .

item.s: Make sure the artwork is simple .
Pictures of flowers and other landscapes are good choices .
Your bedroom should be calm and peaceful , and you 're most likely going to look at this artwork while you 're going to sleep .

figure.rend: Choose Artwork for Your Bedroom Step 2 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Consider your values .
For example , some people would rather not have a gory piece of artwork in their room , and some would .
What you choose is really dependent on what you think is best for your room .
Artwork can be a very personal thing , so buy something that makes you feel peaceful and relaxed , and that you like .

figure.rend: Choose Artwork for Your Bedroom Step 3 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Consider the atmosphere , size and lighting in your room .
For example , if your room is very dark , then you may or may not want artwork that is very dark colored in your room .

figure.rend: Choose Artwork for Your Bedroom Step 4 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Take note of the colors of certain things in your room , such as your bedspread and carpet .
Once you take note of this , try and find artwork that contrasts with the colors of the things that are in your room .

figure.rend: Choose Artwork for Your Bedroom Step 5.jpg

item.s: Decide which medium you prefer .
When most people think of artwork , they think of pictures , posters and paintings .
However , things like mini sculptures , and even curtains could be good artwork examples too .

figure.rend: Choose Artwork for Your Bedroom Step 6.jpg

head.s: Considering Other Things in Your Room

p.s: Sometimes , you may not think about it , but other things in your room can be considered artwork as well .

list.item:
Clean your bedroom
.
A clean room can also help evoke a peaceful , relaxing mood , and although you may not think about it , if it is clean enough , it can be considered artwork itself .

item.s: Consider adding a few accents .
Accents can help with the mood in a bedroom as well , choose items such as a vase , as well as a plant to go inside it .
As with the artwork , avoid getting the vase in a bright color , as your bedroom is a place for you to sleep in .

figure.rend: Choose Artwork for Your Bedroom Step 8.jpg

item.s: Have a style in your room for the furniture .
Whether it is shabby chic , or modern , your room is where you can be you .
So , choose a style for your room that reflects who you are .

figure.rend: Choose Artwork for Your Bedroom Step 9.jpg

item.s: Consider repainting your bedroom walls .
As with the artwork , try to repaint your walls a cool color that you really like .
If you go to the store , there are often a ton of choices , so you wo n't be too limited when deciding .

figure.rend: Choose Artwork for Your Bedroom Step 10.jpg

item.s: Have a floor that contrasts with the rest of your room .
Usually , although it may stain , plain white is a good option , but pick a color that you like and that contrasts with the rest of your room .
You could always make your own work if you 'd like .
This can sometimes be a cheaper option , as some art supplies can be found at craft and department stores for very low prices .
Also , you will have total control over what goes on the canvas .
If you 'd rather not paint your walls yourself , although you will most likely have to pay them , you can hire a professional painter that will do your walls for you .
Try not to have a carpet that matches your wall colors , as this may not look nice .
For example , if your walls are a dark green color , then try not to have a dark green colored carpet .
If you have a lower headboard , consider securely hanging your artwork above your bed .
This way , especially if the artwork is peaceful , you will see the artwork as you are going to get into your bed to go to sleep .
If you are concerned about what people may think , remember that a lot of people wo n't see it .
While almost everyone who comes over to your house will see the bathroom , a very little amount of people will see your room .
Try to buy artwork that you 'll want to have for a while .
Sometimes , artwork can be very hard to get down once it is hung up , so keep this in mind when you are choosing things for your room .
If you 're a child or teenager , have your parents change your carpet and walls if you want them changed , and be sure to ask permission before hanging up artwork .
